pageTitle: Villa Sol Costa Rica - Villa Sol Beach Hotel Resort in Playa Hermosa
textBeforeTable: The rooms are built in typical Spanish style with white exterior walls and red tiled roof. Local hardwoods are extensively used throughout and all villas have a large terrace with spectacular ocean views for guests to enjoy the gentle breezes of Papagayo Gulf. Standard Rooms feature 2 double beds, private bathroom with hot water, mini bar, coffee maker, alarm clock and security box. Standard Room Rooms and Rates --> Reservations Amenities Transportation Restaurant Photo Gallery Conference
textAfterTable: The villas are built in typical Spanish style with white exterior walls and red tiled roof. Local hardwoods are extensively used throughout and all villas have a large terrace with spectacular ocean views for guests to enjoy the gentle breezes of Papagayo Gulf. This Villa features 1 double bed and a sofa bed, private bathroom with hot water, mini bar, coffee maker, alarm clock and security box.
